title: [POE] The Fall of Oriath 5/8 更新

replies.msg:
各位巴打係時侯番黎啦


Trailer https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lgWzr0Vxyrw


重要更新
1) 取消3個難度設定 改為ACT1-10
2) 全新MTX系統
3) 萬神殿Pantheon system
4) Double Dip已成過去 Bleed/Ignite/poison歸納做ailment 傷害獨立計算
5) 裝備上既ES 減少約30%, CI後面既天賦全部移除
6) 暫時有兩個新channel skill
7) 頭兩個Lab難度太減
8) 賊仔獎勵大改 全殺俾兩點passive
Alira: 5 mana regeneration/sec, 20% critical strike multiplier, 15% all elemental res
Kraityn is 6% increased attack speed /Increased cast speed / 3% attack dodge / 6% Movement speed
Oak is 1% life regeneration/second, 2% physical damage reduction, 20% increased physical damage


SMALL TIPS
ACT3 石像依家係第兩個水道會執到兩舊
